thread.title: Me loves ME London
thread.title_full: Me loves ME London - Review of ME London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: LohraC
title: Me loves ME London
text:
This is my 3rd stay with ME London, from its fantastic central location to the little personalised touches in the room, I would not stay anywhere else in London. The team look after you with absolute finesse from the moment you enter the hotel.
From breakfast to dinner to drinks I have received outstanding service in all areas. It truly is a gem in the heart of London.
Thank you ME!
